illustrator: Shinji Higuchi + Sachiko Eba/樋口真嗣+江場左知子
name: Palkia & Dialga LEGEND

attacks.name: Sudden Delete
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. Put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it back into your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Time Control
attacks.effect: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Palkia & Dialga LEGEND. Add the top 2 cards of your opponent’s deck to his or her Prize cards.
